author: carpoolcrypto
title: CarPool Onboard & Learning Platform
description: Global market conditions are driving millions of people to hastily seek investment in blockchain & crypto w/ little knowledge of fundamental values, principles, purpose, and wallet & asset security.

f6_assessments.q0: The problem stated by this proposal is clear and its objective to set up a course platform in order to educate people to understand how blockchain works and the investment process makes it a project aligned with the challenge, allowing a better understanding and thus facilitating the adoption of Cardano. This added value is conscious and well explained by the team. The KPIs are really well detailed and correspond in large part with those of the challenge. They are classified into 3 main parts and linked with the mission and vision of the project. The team specifies that this proposal could be enough to launch the project well and participate in the network but considers that it would be possible for members of the team to make proposals addressing future challenges.
f6_assessments.q1: The members are easily identifiable, as are their skills, with links as evidence. Whether it's the plan, the roadmap, the KPIs, all the information is really complete, detailed and shows that this project has been well developed and through in its entirety. The budget is detailed, it is divided into different tasks to be accomplished, it seems reasonable. Technical details are covered in an understandable way. All these explanations allow us to fully understand the implementation of this project and the whole thing seems realistic. With short, medium and long term objectives, which is a plus. The risks are approached in a serious way with good solutions to remedy them.
f6_assessments.q2: The fact that this project was developed well before the implementation of this proposal shows the commitment of this team. The website being already created and the process already initiated is an additional sign of confidence. The roadmap is detailed, with a plan covering 8 months of development. The KPIs make sense and the way they are explained really helps us to understand what will be the indices of success on which to base ourselves to attest to the proper functioning of this proposal. The community will be able to follow the progress of this initiative through the platform, the website. The team plans to re-adapt the project based on student feedback, which shows an attention to flexibility and adaptability, but also a willingness to adapt the content to the real needs of the ecosystem.

f6_assessments.q0: The issue being current global market conditions are making millions of people to invest in blockchain and crypto with less knowledge regarding their principles, purpose, and wallet & asset security. The proposer wants to resolve it by launching a platform that provides live In-person and Virtual interactive classes which would teach people fundamentals of blockchain, crypto and security related things. By doing this proposer will be able make people aware about blockchain and crypto. Many people around the world think crypto a bubble due to lack of knowledge if people get aware about blockchain people will gain faith about crypto as a whole. Also prevent them from falling into scam. Hence the proposer effectively addresses the issue.
f6_assessments.q1: Based on the information given the proposer has the required skills and experience to make this proposal a reality. The proposal consist of a clear plan and also consist of a clear budget breakdown they have considered all possible expenses which would be very helpful for auditors. Based on the fund breakdown the fund requested seems justified. The proposer has considered all possible risks that would affect successful implementation of the proposal. By all the above it is likely that this proposal will be implemented successfully
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has given a clear detailed plan divided into monthly milestones and a clear timeline. The proposal also consist of detailed budget breakdown these will be helpful to track the progress of the proposal. The proposer has also provided detailed key performance Indicators which will be very useful for tracking the development. The proposer has also provided details to measure the success of proposal this will be helpful to track success of the proposal. The information given should be enough to audit the progress of the proposal

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal seeks to further develop a crypto learning app providing real-time live education for those looking to get into crypto, specifically Carano. This has more of an outreach project aim than a strict dApp, but this will indeed meet the challenge goals. I would prefer to see this in an outreach challenge, but there is not one in this fund. That said, this will be impactful in reaching the overall fund goals of improving the ecosystem and increasing and preparing people to become members in the Cardano community. This proposal is well done and will create a positive impact to the community. The proposer has already invested much of his own funds into this project and will continue on their roadmap without funding, but funding would dramatically improve their efficiency and speed up the time to market of this platform.
f6_assessments.q1: The details on this proposal give assessors plenty to recognize the full feasibility of this proposal. The roadmap and budget are fantastica and give a really good look into the details of this project. I can see how the funds will be spent and there are no questions about the budget funding. The team has a solid makeup of those skilled in the requisite areas. The marketing plan has been solid and will continue to grow this community. The timeline will be straightforward to follow through with. This is a really solid proposal with high marks for feasibility.
f6_assessments.q2: There are very clear and detailed metrics for success and auditability. This project team will submit regular reports with metrics on all aspects of their development. These line up with the goal of the proposal and the challenge goals well. There is already a solid web presence with places for the community to find details regarding progress. I hope to see this proposal succeed.

f6_assessments.q0:
Educating the mass about the new block chain technology is one of the most important goals the community should have. Not only will it help the people who get to learn the block chain technology, but the community will benefit from it. Many are new to this technology or are reluctant to learn more about it due to some false information. So, an introductory course of this will be appreciated by many.  
The team is going to provide live and recorded classes to those who enrol in the program. This will allow the participants to learn at their own time, and the live classes will lead to more interaction between the students, which is a major aspect of a decentralised community. 
Hence this project is clearly in lines with that of the challenge. This is a product that would greatly benefit the future of the community and hence I rate the impact a 5 out of 5.
f6_assessments.q1:
One of the major metrics for the success of a learning platform is the number of students enrolled and the number of students who are actively participating and actually learning from it. There is no way to “force” anyone to go through a course especially in an offline setting, unless they themselves are interested in learning. The team has found a wonderful solution for this. The platform will award crypto for homework, attendance, and other activities and acts as a motivation for students (before they develop the interest of cause) to participate and learn.
A clear monthly roadmap is provided by the team. Also, the design and creation of the educational content is done in the early stages of the plan, hence there is plenty of time for improvement and polishing it as it is the most important piece of the whole project. 
A monthly breakdown of the budget is also provided by the team. It is quite reasonable. 
The team members are well knowledge too for the development of educational material and platform creation (8+ years of experience) , hence I rate the feasibility a 5 out of 5.
f6_assessments.q2:
The key metrics are carefully chosen by the team and have brought in clever solutions of increasing them. like awarding students with crypto for their participating which will motivate them to involve in the community more. This helps in the upbringing of a decentralised community and boosts the success of the platform. Participation is a major metric even mention in the challenge description. 
I did not find any system mentioned in the description to track the progress is the development stage of the platform. It would definitely take a solid 6 months before students can actually enrol and study the course. So any reports or documentation of the progress in this time is much appreciated by the team. After the completion of the platform it is very easy to audit and measure the success of the project using the methods mentioned by the team in the description and hence I rate the auditability 4 out of 5.

f6_assessments.q0: This web-based and educational platform aims to help the massive onboarding Cardano Catalyst is looking to enhance and strengthen their dynamics and transactions. Nevertheless, this kind of proposal might be fitting better into the Developer Ecosystem challenge as it is more targeted to the drawing in and onboarding massively and not to the punctual development of a special product or dapp. Live sessions with real interactions and a strong marketing strategy might do the heavy lifting here. Giving basic knowledge and enhancing blockchain technology and Cardano Catalyst insights in a wider audience is the key element for a strong resilient outreaching strategy. This kind of project will help the Catalyst Community to fight against general reluctance and distrust and help make the crypto and blockchain universe friendlier for a wider and more massive onboarding and large-scale adoption of Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1: The Carpool roadmap isn’t clear enough. There are inconsistencies in the presentation including timeline and budget breakdown. Having their roadmap initiating in February 2022 and there is no clear road for how the educative platform plans to be financially self-sustaining within just a couple of months after the launching. All the working months that are behind the present funding time lapses will have to be reached in a couple of weeks and that is not feasible. Team experience is not abundant either in software or digital platform building or in Cardano Catalyst previous funds. Although they enjoy educational and marketing experience this might not be enough to implement their proposal successfully as they might find a wide range of hurdles when facing real and concrete issues.
f6_assessments.q2: KPIs measurement in student number and loyalty and the capturing of data will be sufficient to audit the success of the proposal once it’s already delivered but there is a lack of communication strategy in sharing a detailed working-progress with the Cardano Catalyst during the building process. The information presented might not be enough to sufficiently audit this proposal working process. Some detailed milestones should be designed in order to have a efficient auditability within Catalyst.

solution: Launch web-based learning platform that delivers LIVE in-person & virtual interactive classes & courses emphasizing the fundamentals of blockchain, crypto, & security; all the things we wished WE knew
experience: A combined total of 50 yrs of professional experience in marketing/biz dev, cryptocurrency/stock market investing/trading/operating, charting, educational course dev & deployment, adult learning, simulation learning, & facilitating learning events/environments for broad audiences
